content: 36 sts on each needle there are now 64 72 sts in set-up row size m/l p59 total work the round heel turn back and forth foot and gusset starting on the rs as follows knit two rounds with mc one round with cc row 1 rs sl1 k32 k38 kfb k1 w&t and one round with mc switch to larger row 2 ws p18 p22 pfb p1 w&t needles if preferred row 3 rs k17 k20 kfb k1 w&t row 4 ws p16 p18 pfb p1 w&t in this stranded colourwork pattern it s row 5 rs k14 k16 kfb k1 w&t recommended to use mc as the dominant row 6 ws p12 p14 pfb p1 w&t colour row 7 rs k10 k12 kfb k1 w&t row 8 ws p8 p10 pfb k1 w&t work sts on needle 1 according to chart a1 row 9 rs k6 k8 kfb k1 w&t b1 and sts on needle 2 according to chart a2 row 10 ws p4 p6 pfb p1 w&t b2 until work measures approximately 9 10 row 11 rs k19 k22 knitting the wraps cm / 3½ 4 inches less than the desired final together with the wrapped sts if preferred length turn row 12 ws sl1 p30 p34 purling the wraps next continue to work sts on needle 1 together with the wrapped sts if preferred according to chart a1 b1 work sts on needle turn 2 as follows work chart a2 b2 sts 1-16 1- 18 work chart c work chart a2 b2 sts 18- work the slipped stitch heel flap back and 32 20-36 please note that chart c i e the forth starting on the rs as follows pin-striped gusset replaces chart a2 b2 stitch 17 19 row 1 rs *sl1 k1* repeat * - * a total of 15 17 times ssk turn work as described until you have finished row 2 ws sl1 p29 33 p2tog turn chart c row 20 24 slip the first stitch of needle 2 onto needle 1 there are now 33 37 repeat heel flap row 1 and 2 until 32 36 sts sts on needle 1 i e the instep and 51 59 sts remain on needle 2 and you have just finished on needle 2 i e the sole a rs row do not turn but continue working in the round the emperor s bride socks page 2/7 heel continued from the previous page leg and cuff slip the last stitch of needle 1 onto needle 2 work sts on needle 1 according to chart a1 there are now 32 36 sts on needle 1 i e the b1 and sts on needle 2 according to a3 b1 front of the leg and 33 37 sts on needle 2 until leg measures approximately 3-4 cm / 1½ i e the back of the leg inches less than the desired final length for the best result it s recommended to finish the work sts on needle 1
